title: Repository Snapshot Result v1
description: Structured output produced by the repo snapshot skill: full markdown snapshot, condensed memory, and human checklist.

project_snapshot_md.description: Long markdown text with a fixed structure of sections describing the repository comprehensively.

global_memory_md.description: Short condensed summary (3-10 bullet points or 1-3 paragraphs) suitable for inserting into a new chat's global memory.

checklist_for_human.description: Markdown list of actions for the human: where to save the snapshot, which files to create/update.
